title: DDFP 648: The Bald Bryan movie special!
itunes:title: DDFP 648: The Bald Bryan movie special!
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Bald Bryan for a special edition movie show! Shek and Bald debate whether Jerry McGuire is a sports movie or a RomCom (29:00) and which sports movies make Shek’s all-time list (56:50). Next Bald Bryan gives us a list of actors playing redundant roles in movies (47:50). Lastly, Shek and Bald Bryan try to induct the initial "Hall of All" class (12:05). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
